user.title: Ensure Device Control
user.description: Configure timing and retry settings for reliable device control.

data.command_delay: Command delay in milliseconds (50-1000) - Delay between commands to multiple devices, no state wait
data.retry_delay: Retry delay increment in milliseconds (250-2000) - Added per retry attempt for progressive backoff

error.invalid_retries: Maximum retries must be between 1 and 10
error.invalid_command_delay: Command delay must be between 50 and 1000 milliseconds
error.invalid_retry_delay: Retry delay must be between 250 and 2000 milliseconds
error.invalid_background_delay: Background retry delay must be between 10 and 300 seconds
